participant_1.background:
I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.
I now enjoy gardening and cooking with my favorite ingredients.
i work as a personal trainer , 5 days a week.
I like to share my time and company with others.
I don't have any kids, but I'm close to my family.

participant_2.background:
I'm not a morning person, but I love reading mystery novels.
i am recently divorced.
i listen to podcasts.
i like to fly kites.
i daydream about cafes in paris.

content.text: Hey! I'm a teacher. What do you like to do?
I love to read mystery novels and fly kites! What are your favorite things to do?
I love to garden and cook! I also love to spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds awesome! I love to cook too, but I'm not very good at it. Haha!
Oh, don't worry! I'm not that great at it either! It's just a fun hobby.
Yeah, it definitely is! What kind of things do you like to cook?
I like to cook all kinds of things, but my favorite is probably Italian food.
Oh, that sounds delicious! I love Italian food too!
It is! I'm actually going to make some pasta for dinner tonight.
That sounds amazing! I wish I could have some!
Maybe you can come over for dinner!
Great! I'll send you a message later
